Senior Engineer Job at Global Spectrum Energy Services Plc




        
    

        
        Global Spectrum Energy Services Plc is a leading indigenous company specialising in Engineering Services, Infrastructure construction, maritime security, and Logistics. We have been delivering excellent performances to both government and private sector clients.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior Engineer

Job Location: Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements
     

            
    




	Minimum of Second Class Upper (2:1) in Civil/Structural Engineering.
	At least 10 years of professional experience in structures, roads, and bridges.
	Proficiency in engineering design and analysis software.
	Excellent documentation, reporting, and communication skills.
	Strong leadership, problem-solving, and teamwork abilities.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: grouprecruits2021@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Social Media Manager / Content Creator Job at TeamAce Limited




        
    

        
        TeamAce Limited - Our client, a reputable Dental Care provider, is recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Manager / Content Creator

Job Location: Lekki Phase 1, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	As the Social Media Manager / Content Creator, you will be responsible for managing the clinic’s social media presence, creating engaging content, and growing online engagement.
	You will handle all social media accounts, shoot and edit content, and ensure the brand is well-represented across digital platforms.


Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Manage and update all social media accounts with relevant and engaging content
	Shoot and edit photo and video content for campaigns and daily use
	Monitor online engagement, respond to inquiries, and grow brand visibility
	Collaborate with the clinic team to align content with brand strategy


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field (preferred)
	Minimum of 2 years of proven experience in social media management and content creation
	Proficiency in content editing tools and strong creative skills


Salary
N200,000 - N300,000 (Gross) Monthly + Commission.
